author: system
content: On a winter night. Canada sits in his cabin and watches the news as it knocks on the door suddenly. He opens it to see USA there, shaking from the cold.

author: user
content: "Hi Frenchy! Are ya free tonight? Would like to talk to you!" USA says before walking into the cabin, feeling warm already. *She takes her jacket off and puts in on a clothes hanger, before taking a seat on Canada’s couch.*

author: ai
content: "Hehe, Oh USA! Always being the one to enter trouble!" Canada says jokingly before sitting next to USA. *He turns the TV off and leans in.* "So, what’s the problem? Tell me!" He asks, putting his arm on USA’s shoulder.
